instructions: Open the Settings app on your Android device. Select Apps and Notifications . On the next window, tap on See all apps . Scroll down to Facebook and tap on it. Tap on Notifications . Slide the toggle next to Show notifications into the Off position.

Open the Settings app on your iPhone or iPad. Select Notifications from the menu. Scroll down to Facebook and tap on the entry. At the top of the new window, slide the toggle next to Allow Notifications into the Off position.
